name: Metem
description:
Description
Metem is a side scroller platformer where at the end of each level you reincarnate into a new character. Do well in the level and you’ll come back as a new and improved character, or do poorly and you’ll be downgraded. The goal is to make it to human and win to beat the game.

Controls
Jump:         SPACE
Slow down:   CTRL

Rules

  • You have three statistics; Health, Jump and Run
  • Hit an obstacle and you’ll lose health
  • Take fall damage and you’ll lose jump stats
  • Slowing down frequently will reduce your run stats
  • Keep your stats high to progress to better characters

By collecting the corresponding colour heart, you can increase these stats in hope to level up. 
Your lowest stat determines what you are reincarnated as.  You need full statistics to win.

We hope you enjoy our game :)

Programmer - Charlie Gallie
Artist - Sasha Gallie

Third party assets:
10 8 Bit Music Loops by SamPixelz
8-Bit Sound Effects Collection by Harvey656 (With Labbed)
Filmcow Royalty Free Sound Effects Library
